title: Class storage failure for old namespace style classes
body:
```
Fatal error: Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for Braintree_Transaction in phar:///.../psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php:42
Stack trace:
#0 phar:///.../psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Codebase/Properties.php(72): _HumbugBoxaf7094e20827\Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get('Braintree_Trans...')
#1 phar:///.../psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Fetch/PropertyFetchAnalyzer.php(309): _HumbugBoxaf7094e20827\Psalm\Internal\Codebase\Properties->propertyExists('Braintree_Trans...', false, Object(_HumbugBoxaf7094e20827\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(_HumbugBoxaf7094e20827\Psalm\Context), NULL)
#2 phar:///.../psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(181): _HumbugBoxaf7094e20827\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\ in phar:///.../psalm.phar/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php on line 42
```

Reproduction steps:
1. Install vendors using following  composer.json:
```
{
    "name": "dmitry.balabka/psalm-test",
    "authors": [
        {
            "name": "Dmitry Balabka",
            "email": "dmitry.balabka@ecentria.com"
        }
    ],
    "require": {
        "braintree/braintree_php": "^3.16.0"
    }
}
```
2. Create file `src/test.php`
```
<?php

$some = Braintree_Transaction::class;
```
3. Install Psalm PHAR with default configuration (`--init`)
4. Run:
```
php ./psalm.phar
```
